name: Mortis Maximus
description:
After years in prison, you finally have the chance to earn your freedom. All you need to do is shoot until nothing moves. Step on the black and yellow areas to summon the undead.

Can you survive the swarm, or will you be eaten alive?

Controls:
-Tab to open Menu
-Shift for directional dash
-Space to jump (and walljump)
-G to throw grenade
-E to swap weapons

This is a very, very early build. There's no 'win' screen yet, no options menu, and there's only one level. All of that will change soon.
Thank you for playing, and your feedback is always appreciated!
